AT.name: Super Meat Boy
AT.description: Super Meat Boy ist ein knallharter Plattformer, in dem du einen animierten Fleischwürfel spielst, der versucht, seine Freundin (die zufälligerweise aus Bandagen besteht) vor einem bösartigen, Anzug tragenden Fötus im Einmachglas zu retten. Unser fleischiger Held springt von Wänden, überquert Meere aus Sägen und wandert durch einstürzende Höhlen und Pfützen voll alter Nadeln. Er setzt sein Leben aufs Spiel, um seine Jungfrau in Nöten zu retten. Super Meat Boy ist so schwierig wie alte Klassiker und macht daraus ein unkompliziertes Plattformspiel, das sich aufs Wesentliche konzentriert und schnelle Reaktionen erfordert. Der Schwierigkeitsgrad steigert sich von hart zu entmutigend. Dabei wird Meat Boy von SMB durch verfluchte Krankenhäuser, Salzfabriken und sogar durch die Hölle selbst geschleift. Als ob mehr als 300 Singleplayer-Levels nicht schon genug wären: SMB hat auch noch epische Bosskämpfe, tonnenweise freischaltbare Geheimnisse, Warpzonen und versteckte Charaktere zu bieten.

AU.name: Super Meat Boy
AU.description: Super Meat Boy is a tough as nails platformer where you play as an animated cube of meat who's trying to save his girlfriend (who happens to be made of bandages) from an evil fetus in a jar wearing a tux. Our meaty hero will leap from walls, over seas of buzz saws, through crumbling caves and pools of old needles. Sacrificing his own well being to save his damsel in distress. Super Meat Boy brings the old school difficulty of classic titles and stream lines them down to the essential no BS straight forward twitch reflex platforming. Ramping up in difficulty from hard to soul crushing SMB will drag Meat boy though haunted hospitals, salt factories and even hell itself. And if 300+ single player levels weren't enough SMB also throws in epic boss fights, tons of unlockable secrets, warp zones and hidden characters.

BG.name: Super Meat Boy
BG.description: Super Meat Boy is a tough as nails platformer where you play as an animated cube of meat who's trying to save his girlfriend (who happens to be made of bandages) from an evil fetus in a jar wearing a tux. Super Meat Boy brings the old school difficulty of classic titles and stream lines them down to the essential no BS straight forward twitch reflex platforming. Ramping up in difficulty from hard to soul crushing SMB will drag Meat boy though haunted hospitals, salt factories and even hell itself. And if 300+ single player levels weren't enough SMB also throws in epic boss fights, tons of unlockable secrets, warp zones and hidden characters.

BE.name: Super Meat Boy
BE.description: Super Meat Boy est un plateformer très dur où vous incarnez un petit cube de viande qui essaie de sauver sa copine (qui est faite de pansements) des griffes d'un fœtus maléfique, coincé dans un bocal vêtu d'un smoking. Notre héros bondira d'un mur à l'autre, au-dessus de scies mécaniques, à travers des cavernes qui s'effonfrent et des piscines remplies d'aiguilles, tout en essayant de ne pas se "viander". Il sacrifiera son propre bien-être pour sauver sa demoiselle en détresse. Super Meat Boy remet au goût du jour la difficulté des grands classiques et va à l'essentiel : de l'action de plateforme sans chichis, qui vous fera travailler vos réflexes. En faisant grimper la difficulté du niveau difficile à cauchemardesque, SMB va traîner Meat Boy d'hôpitaux hantés en usines de sel, en passant même par les enfers. Et si plus de 300 niveaux solo ne sont pas suffisants, SMB propose aussi des combats de boss épiques, des tonnes de secrets à débloquer, des zones de téléportation et des personnages cachés.

ES.name: Super Meat Boy
ES.description: Super Meat Boy es un juego de plataformas extremadamente difícil en el que juegas en la piel de un cubo de carne animado que intenta salvar a su novia (que está hecha de vendajes) de un malvado feto en un tarro que viste de esmoquin. Nuestro carnoso héroe saltará por las paredes, sobre mares de sierras, a través de cuevas que se desmoronan y por fosos llenos de jeringuillas usadas. Se jugará el pescuezo para salvar a su damisela en apuros. Super Meat Boy trae de vuelta la dificultad de los títulos clásicos de antaño, que refina hasta dar con la esencia de los juegos de plataformas directos y basados en los reflejos. El nivel de dificultad de SMB va aumentando de difícil a descorazonador, mientas Meat Boy recorre hospitales embrujados, fábricas de sal e incluso el mismísimo infierno. Y por si los más de 300 niveles para un jugador no fueran suficiente, SMB también incluye jefes épicos, toneladas de secretos para desbloquear, zonas de distorsión y personajes secretos.

IT.name: Super Meat Boy
IT.description: Super Meat Boy è un platform difficilissimo con protagonista un cubo di carne animato che vuole salvare la sua fidanzata (fatta di cerotti) dalle grinfie di un malvagio feto in bottiglia che indossa uno smoking. Il nostro carnoso eroe salterà sulle pareti, oltre mari di seghe rotanti, attraverso caverne pericolanti e su laghi di vecchi aghi, sacrificandosi per salvare la sua damigella in pericolo. Super Meat Boy riprende la difficoltà vecchio stile dei grandi classici e la distilla in un'esperienza platform essenziale e senza fronzoli, che richiede riflessi fulminei.

Ramping up in difficulty from hard to soul crushing SMB will drag Meat boy though haunted hospitals, salt factories and even hell itself. And if 300+ single player levels weren't enough SMB also throws in epic boss fights, tons of unlockable secrets, warp zones and hidden characters.

NL.name: Super Meat Boy
NL.description: Super Meat Boy is een loodzware platformer waarin jij een levend blokje vlees bent dat zijn vriendinnetje (dat uit verband bestaat) uit de klauwen van een slechte, kostuumdragende foetus in een pot moet redden. Onze vlezige held springt en rent van muren, over velden vol cirkelzagen, door instortende grotten en massa's vieze naalden om de dame in nood te kunnen redden. Super Meat Boy bevat de oldschool moeilijkheidsgraad van klassieke titels en tovert ze om tot een gestroomlijnde besturing, zonder fratsen. Je kunt SMB op verschillende moeilijkheidsniveaus spelen, van moeilijk tot gruwelijk wreed, terwijl je Meat Boy door spookachtige ziekenhuizen, zoutfabrieken en zelfs de hel moet leiden. En zijn de ruim 300 singleplayerlevels nog niet genoeg? SMB bevat gelukkig ook nog epische eindgevechten, talloze geheimen om vrij te spelen, warpzones en verborgen personages.

NZ.name: Super Meat Boy
NZ.description: Super Meat Boy is a tough as nails platformer where you play as an animated cube of meat who's trying to save his girlfriend (who happens to be made of bandages) from an evil fetus in a jar wearing a tux. Our meaty hero will leap from walls, over seas of buzz saws, through crumbling caves and pools of old needles. Sacrificing his own well being to save his damsel in distress. Super Meat Boy brings the old school difficulty of classic titles and stream lines them down to the essential no BS straight forward twitch reflex platforming. Ramping up in difficulty from hard to soul crushing SMB will drag Meat boy though haunted hospitals, salt factories and even hell itself. And if 300+ single player levels weren't enough SMB also throws in epic boss fights, tons of unlockable secrets, warp zones and hidden characters.

PT.name: Super Meat Boy
PT.description: O Super Meat Boy é um jogo de plataformas duro de roer onde jogamos com um cubo de carne que tenta salvar a sua namorada (que por acaso é feita de ligaduras) de um feto malévolo vestido com um smoking e metido num jarro. O nosso herói carnudo irá saltar a partir de paredes e por cima de mares de serras elétricas, através de cavernas em ruínas e piscinas cheias de agulhas usadas, sacrificando o seu bem-estar para salvar a sua amada. Super Meat Boy recupera a dificuldade dos títulos clássicos da velha guarda e apresenta uma jogabilidade de plataformas em estado puro e sem floreados onde o mais importante são os reflexos rápidos e as reações instintivas. Prepara-te para ser esmagado pela dificuldade do SMB, que arrasta o Meat Boy através de hospitais assombrados, fábricas de sal e até mesmo o inferno. E se os mais de 300 níveis para jogador individual não chegam, o SMB também apresenta combates épicos contra bosses, toneladas de segredos, zonas de warp e personagens escondidas.

RU.name: Super Meat Boy
RU.description: Super Meat Boy – это невероятно трудный платформер, в котором вы играете за анимированный мясной кубик, который пытается спасти свою подругу (представьте себе, она сделана из пластыря) от злого зародыша в смокинге внутри стеклянной банки. Наш мясистый герой отталкивается от стен, перепрыгивает моря циркулярных пил, преодолевает рушащиеся пещеры и бассейны использованных игл. Жертвует своим здоровьем, чтобы спасти подругу. Super Meat Boy напоминает по сложности игры старой школы и сводит вместе все основные элементы линейного платформера, в котором важны только ваша скорость реакции и рефлексы. Повышая уровень сложности от трудного до невозможного SMB проведет Мясного Парня по кишащим призраками больницам, солевым фабрикам и даже самому аду.
